medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient presented with allergic problems of asthma and rhinitis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms were of long standing. Seasonal rhinitis began in March, with suggestive birch pollen allergy. The patient also experienced vomiting after certain foods and had a previous severe reaction to ibuprofen after an operation when a latex drain was inserted. Asthma control was poor, with significant nocturnal wheeze.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient was diagnosed with latex allergy. She also had a history of irritable bowel syndrome and recurrent tonsillitis, and experienced a severe reaction to ibuprofen.
medical_history.social_history: The patient worked as a bank clerk and had a history of latex exposure through clothing, gloves, and dental and gynecological procedures.
